title: Lost for You
description:
"Taryn was every song. And every lyric. Everything I'd ever wanted."

 -- Chase Noble 

At eighteen, I stood at the precipice of stardom. I had the record deal. And the tour to back it up.But I succumbed to the pressure of that life. The dark side. I had to give it all up if I wanted to live.A trip to rehab, four years at Stanford, and I came back to Austin a changed man.Clean and sober.And ready to help my brother do the one thing I couldn’t.Make it in the music industry.That was ten years ago, and I never looked back.And then I met Taryn Ayers.The music manager behind the three biggest bands in the country.She holds the key to my brother’s success in her hands.Making her off limits.But she’s like drug. Stronger than any I’ve ever taken.One look at her and I knew the true meaning of addiction. Will Taryn end up destroying my life for good?Or could she be the one woman to do the impossible? ​Save me from myself.Lost For You is a STAND ALONE New Adult Romance with recurring characters. Pick up books 1-3 to get the full experience!
author: Jayne Frost
